AzureBlade: Just let me finish this one, I'm ready right after!!

He was getting more and more excited about this fight, but he was not 
conscious this was getting more and more alike to the time he killed 
his commander...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ice covered herself with a telekinetic shield. the missles struck 
forceing
> her backwards in a loop. Her owl form was much weaker than her polar 
bear
> but to her misfortune she needed her flying abilities and the owls 
sight.
> "If you really feel that way then I'll play along." her small curved 
beak
> began to glow and two energy depleating bursts launched through the 
air
> toward it's intended target Perceptor.
> 
> Ice was pleased when she heard AzureBlade respond that he was 
willing to
> listen, She'd never fealt herself as a leader but the need for a 
ralying
> force pushed her on. "We got one of thier jets on the ground behind 
that
> rock." she directed pointing a wing toward where Triggerhappy and 
Blowpipe
> were hid, "If we keep him there it'll weaken thier air support." She 
paused
> to observe the rest of the battlefield, "Think you can keep him 
busy?"
> 
> OOC, Dewey said he's posting for Mustex in the chat room.

hand
> > if she didn't know the outcome. If Lunarpine had taught her one 
thing
> > it was that she was no fighter. If she was to get through this it
> > wato be by intelligence, not force. "Maximals, we're getting 
nowhere
> > fighting individual battles. move together and I can direct you."
> > knowing also about the dease fire between the black fortress

that
> > was aranged a while back, turn and leave and maybe you'll save the

> > her Maximal back ground was needed over her mutant powers. 
"Maximals
